MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL40 postcode area of Dolgellau, affecting properties in Cader Road, Towyn Road, Nant Y Gader and surrounding streets. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5.30PM to safely remove tree from the overhead line network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 7PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5PM on 12th February 2021.
